summary: Add a styled announcement message to the top of the existing public Shop tab/page indicating online purchases are not yet available and directing users to request custom quotes via website and social channels.

existing_features.title: Add the provided "Shop is Awakening" announcement message to the existing public Shop page/tab (frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx) and render it near the top of the page content, above the current shop controls/products content, styled consistently with the rest of the site using existing layout/components (e.g., PageLayout, FadeInSection, shadcn Card/Alert, existing theme classes). The announcement text must be displayed exactly as provided (including punctuation and the âœ¨).

new_feature_requests.summary: Display the provided 'Shop is Awakening' announcement message at the top of the existing public Shop tab/page, styled consistently with the rest of the website.

projectName: Add 'Shop is Awakening' announcement to top of public Shop page
